com.defano.jmonet.algo

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.algo.Transform

  • public class Transform
extends Object
    A utility for performing various affine transform routines supported by the paint tools.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • slant

        public static BufferedImage slant(BufferedImage image,
                                  double theta,
                                  int xTranslation)
        Vertically slants (shears) an image by a given angle and applies an x-translation to compensate for the change in position implied by the slant (allow the vertical center-line to remain constant, if desired).
        Parameters:
        image - The image to transform
        theta - The angle, in radians, to shear the image
        xTranslation - The number of pixels to translate the image, typically this is calculated by determining the number of pixels left or right the image has been sheared (delta between top-left corner and bottom-left corner), then dividing this value in half.
        Returns:
        The sheared and translated result. Note that the size/bounds of the result may be enlarged to prevent clipping.

      • rotate

        public static BufferedImage rotate(BufferedImage image,
                                   double theta,
                                   int anchorX,
                                   int anchorY)
        Rotates an image about a specified axis.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to rotate
        theta - The angle (in radians) that is should be rotated
        anchorX - The x-coordinate of the rotational axis (typically the centerpoint of the image)
        anchorY - The y-coordinate of the rotational axis (typically the centerpoint of the image)
        Returns:
        The rotated image. Note that the size/bounds of the result may be enlarged to prevent clipping of the original image.

      • transform

        public static BufferedImage transform(BufferedImage image,
                                      AffineTransform transform)
        Performs an affine transform on a given image.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to transform
        transform - The transform to perform
        Returns:
        The transformed image

        public static BufferedImage resize(BufferedImage image,
                                   Dimension size)
        Scales an image to a requested dimension.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to be scaled
        size - The dimension the image should be scaled to
        Returns:
        The resized image

      • rubberSheet

        public static BufferedImage rubberSheet(BufferedImage image,
                                        Quadrilateral quadrilateral)
        Performs a rubber sheet projection of an image onto an arbitrary quadrilateral. Implicitly scales the image as required to match the quadrilateral.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to be projected.
        quadrilateral - The quadrilateral on which to project the image
        Returns:
        The projected image

      • project

        public static BufferedImage project(BufferedImage image,
                                    Quadrilateral quadrilateral)
        Performs a homography projection of an image onto an arbitrary quadrilateral. Implicitly scales the image as required to match the quadrilateral.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to be projected
        quadrilateral - The quadrilateral on which to project the image
        Returns:
        The projected image

      • rotateLeft

        public static AffineTransform rotateLeft(int width,
                                         int height)
        Creates an AffineTransform that performs a 90-degree counter-clockwise rotation.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the shape or image to be rotated
        height - The height of the shape or image to be rotated
        Returns:
        The rotation transform

      • rotateRight

        Creates an AffineTransform that performs a 90-degree clockwise rotation.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the shape or image to be rotated
        height - The height of the shape or image to be rotated
        Returns:
        The rotation transform

      • flipHorizontalTransform

        public static AffineTransform flipHorizontalTransform(int width)
        Creates an AffineTransform that performs a horizontal mirroring of a shape or image about its vertical center-line.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the shape or image to be rotated
        Returns:
        The flip transform

      • flipVerticalTransform

        public static AffineTransform flipVerticalTransform(int height)
        Creates an AffineTransform that performs a vertical mirroring of a shape or image about its horizontal center-line.
        Parameters:
        height - The height of the shape or image to be rotated
        Returns:
        The flip transform

      • rotateTransform

        public static AffineTransform rotateTransform(double radians,
                                              int centerX,
                                              int centerY)
        Creates an AffineTransform that performs a rotation about a specified axis.
        Parameters:
        radians - The angle (in radians) that the the transform should rotate
        centerX - The x-coordinate of the axis about which the rotation should occur
        centerY - The y-coordinate of the axis about which the rotation should occur
        Returns:
        The rotation transform

      • invert

        public static void invert(BufferedImage selectedImage,
                          Shape mask)
        Inverts the color of every pixel of an image that lies within a given mask. Operation is destructive to the input image.
        Parameters:
        selectedImage - The image to invert
        mask - The shape determining which pixels to invert; null to invert all pixels

      • adjustBrightness

        public static void adjustBrightness(BufferedImage selectedImage,
                                    Shape mask,
                                    int delta)
        Modifies the brightness/luminosity of every pixel of an image that lies within a given mask. Operation is destructive to the input image.
        Parameters:
        selectedImage - The image whose brightness should be changed
        mask - The shape determining which pixels to adjust; null to adjust all pixels
        delta - A value between -255 and +255; delta will be added to red, green and blue color channels equally ( channel values are clipped in the range of 0..255).

      • adjustTransparency

        public static void adjustTransparency(BufferedImage selectedImage,
                                      Shape mask,
                                      int delta)
        Modifies the alpha channel of every pixel of an image that lies within a given mask. Operation is destructive to the input image.
        Parameters:
        selectedImage - The image whose opacity should be changed
        mask - The shape determining which pixels to adjust; null to adjust all pixels
        delta - A value between -255 and +255; delta will be added to each pixel's alpha channel (alpha channel is clipped in the range of 0..255).

      • fill

        public static void fill(BufferedImage selectedImage,
                        Shape mask,
                        Paint paint,
                        FillFunction fillFunction)
        Fills every transparent pixel of an image that lies within a given mask with a specified paint or texture. Operation is destructive to the input image. Has no effect on pixels which are not fully transparent (i.e., alpha == 0).
        Parameters:
        selectedImage - The image to fill
        mask - The shape determining which transparent pixels to fill; null to adjust all transparent pixels.
        paint - The Paint with which to fill
        fillFunction - An function that applies the paint to each affected pixel. Most users should simply supply an instance of DefaultFillFunction.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • argbCopy

        public static BufferedImage argbCopy(BufferedImage src)
        Makes a "deep" copy of the given image, returning a copy whose type is TYPE_INT_ARGB.
        Parameters:
        src - The image to copy.
        Returns:
        A copy of the source, in ARGB mode.
